notes.title: Exploitability

product.name: Conext ComBox model 865-1058: all versions prior to V3.03 BN 830

notes.text: A series of rapid requests to the device may cause it to reboot.CVE-2017-6019 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary
